paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper describes a BRCA2 variant (542G>T, L105X) found in a kindred with breast and colorectal cancer, detailing penetrance data and individual patient information.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: III: 22 developed a multicentric infiltrating lobular carcinoma.

individual_records.phenotype_details: LCIS with infiltrating lobular carcinoma and endometrial cancer
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Her sister (III: 25) had BC and endometrial cancer and carries the same mutation.

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to a truncated protein, indicating a loss of function.

variants.segregation_data: The BRCA2 mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The study suggests no increased susceptibility to colorectal tumors in BRCA2 mutation carriers.
key_quotes: In this large BC/CRC kindred, MON1080, disease-causing truncating mutations are present in both MSH2 and BRCA2.
Her sister (III: 25) had BC and endometrial cancer and carries the same mutation.

tables_processed.table_caption: Mutation and haplotype results in family MON1080
